name: Locality_displayNameTest
description: Unit tests for the displayName method of the Locality class.

test_cases.name: testDisplayNameNotNull
test_cases.description: Tests that the displayName method returns a non-null value.

test_cases.name: testDisplayNameNotEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests that the displayName method returns a non-empty string.

test_cases.name: testDisplayNameWithCountry
test_cases.description: Tests that the displayName method returns a string containing a country name if it includes parentheses.

test_cases.name: testDisplayNameFallback
test_cases.description: Tests that the displayName method falls back to Locale.ENGLISH.getDisplayLanguage(Locale.ROOT) if the display language is empty.
